attributes.action: Banks and Credit companies to freeze all interest rates on borrowing temporary.
attributes.additional_details:
Although the Bank of England has reduced its base rate, and government are offering a 3 month payment holiday. By freezing rates of interest on borrowing, many people will resort to using credit cards. The Interest rates are high (e.g. 30%) and this will cripple families that cannot afford to buy essentials/pay for items during times of hardship. 
This will have a knock-on effect to recovery after the crisis has stabilised.
attributes.background: Ensure that Banks and Credit companies freeze interest on borrowing for the foreseeable future until things stabilise.
